mapper.select: select count(*) from experience e where from_user_seq = #{userSeq} and status in ('REJECTED', 'SENT')

select my_applied_experiences.to_user_seq, nsbi.store_name, my_applied_experiences.from_post_seq, my_applied_experiences.created_at, my_applied_experiences.status from (select e.to_user_seq, e.from_post_seq, e.created_at, e.status from experience e where from_user_seq = #{userSeq} and e.status in ('REJECTED', 'SENT')) my_applied_experiences inner join user u on my_applied_experiences.to_user_seq = u.seq inner join national_store_business_information nsbi on u.business_number = nsbi.business_number order by my_applied_experiences.created_at desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from experience e where to_user_seq = #{userSeq} and status in ('REJECTED', 'SENT')
